title: Newly Renovated Melbourne City Break with Welcome Wine & Complimentary Parking
description:
Discover Melbourne with a stay at this recently renovated hotel offering easy access to Royal Park - and Melbourne Zoo, located within - and the city’s famous trams. Featuring an outdoor pool, complimentary onsite parking for one vehicle and offbeat Peking Chinese restaurant MOJA Duck, the hotel is a makes for a wonderful stay.

This newly renovated hotel is just a 15-minute drive from the Melbourne’s CBD, making it the perfect place to explore the city from. Head to the famous Lygon Street to sample Melbourne's best Italian food, see the sights of the Queen Victoria Market and enjoy a relating afternoon in the Carlton Gardens.

title: Artistic Boutique Melbourne Escape near Melbourne Zoo with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
description:
Discover the artistic soul of Melbourne with a stay at this boutique hotel inspired by the vibrant works of Australian artist David Larwill. Each room is a canvas of creativity, adorned with original Larwill artworks and offering sweeping views of the city's skyline or the verdant Royal Park.

The hotel is very close to the bustling Queen Victoria Market, Melbourne Zoo, Flemington Race Track and the culinary delights of Lygon Street. After a day of meandering the joyous streets of Parkville, retreat to the hotel's stylish restaurant and enjoy a snack or drink while you plan the next day's itinerary.
location_description: The Larwill Studio Melbourne - Art Series
